languages.text: "По заключению техноматов причиной перепадов мог стать системный сбой... но обнаружить его не удалось. Техножрецы возносят молитвы Омниссии в надежде исправить это".

traits.locale_text: "По заключению техноматов причиной перепадов мог стать системный сбой... но обнаружить его не удалось. Техножрецы возносят молитвы Омниссии в надежде исправить это".

languages.text: "The technomats concluded that they could have been caused by a system failure... but no such failure was confirmed. The Tech-Priests are praying to the Omnissiah in hopes of resolving the issue."
languages.original_text: "По заключению техноматов причиной перепадов мог стать системный сбой... но обнаружить его не удалось. Техножрецы возносят молитвы Омниссии в надежде исправить это".

traits.locale_text: "The technomats concluded that they could have been caused by a system failure... but no such failure was confirmed. The Tech-Priests are praying to the Omnissiah in hopes of resolving the situation."

"The technomats concluded that they could have been caused by a system failure... but no such failure was confirmed. The Tech-Priests are praying to the Omnissiah in hopes of resolving the situation."
"The technomats concluded that they could had been caused by a system failure... but no such failure was confirmed. The Tech-Priests are praying to the Omnissiah in hopes of resolving the issue."
"The technomats concluded that they could had been caused by a system failure... but no such failure was confirmed. The Tech-Priests are praying to the Omnissiah in hopes of resolving the issue."
"The technomats concluded that they could have been caused by a system failure... but no such failure was confirmed. The Tech-Priests are praying to the Omnissiah in hopes of resolving the issue."
"The technomats concluded that they could have been caused by a system failure... but no such failure was confirmed. The Tech-Priests are praying to the Omnissiah in hopes of resolving the issue."

languages.text: « Selon les technomates, ils auraient pu être provoqués par une panne système... mais aucun dysfonctionnement n'a été confirmé. Les technoprêtres prient l'Omnimessie en espérant résoudre le problème. »
languages.original_text: "The technomats concluded that they could have been caused by a system failure... but no such failure was confirmed. The Tech-Priests are praying to the Omnissiah in hopes of resolving the issue."

traits.locale_text: « Selon les technomates, ils auraient pu être provoqués par une panne système... mais aucun dysfonctionnement n'a été confirmé. Les technoprêtres prient l'Omnimessie en espérant résoudre le problème. »

languages.text: “技术人员得出的结论是，可能是由系统故障引起的……但没有足够证据证明这个结论。技术神甫正在向欧姆尼塞亚祈祷，希望能解决这个问题。”
languages.original_text: "The technomats concluded that they could have been caused by a system failure... but no such failure was confirmed. The Tech-Priests are praying to the Omnissiah in hopes of resolving the issue."

traits.locale_text: “技术人员得出的结论是，可能是由系统故障引起的……但没有足够证据证明这个结论。技术祭司正在向欧姆尼塞亚祈祷，希望能解决这个问题。”

languages.text: "Die Technomaten sind zu dem Schluss gekommen, dass sie möglicherweise durch ein Systemversagen ausgelöst wurden ... aber ein solches Versagen konnte nicht bestätigt werden. Die Techpriester beten zum Omnissiah, in der Hoffnung, dass sich das Problem dadurch beheben lässt."
languages.original_text: "The technomats concluded that they could have been caused by a system failure... but no such failure was confirmed. The Tech-Priests are praying to the Omnissiah in hopes of resolving the issue."

traits.locale_text: "Die Technomaten sind zu dem Schluss gekommen, dass sie möglicherweise durch ein Systemversagen ausgelöst wurden ... aber ein solches Versagen konnte nicht bestätigt werden. Die Techpriester beten zum Omnissiah, in der Hoffnung, dass sich das Problem dadurch beheben lässt."

languages.text: «Los tecnómatas han llegado a la conclusión de que puede deberse a un fallo del sistema... pero no han indicado de qué se trata. Los tecnosacerdotes están rezando al Omnissiah para resolver el problema».
languages.original_text: "The technomats concluded that they could have been caused by a system failure... but no such failure was confirmed. The Tech-Priests are praying to the Omnissiah in hopes of resolving the issue."

traits.locale_text: «Los tecnómatas han llegado a la conclusión de que puede deberse a un fallo del sistema... pero no han indicado de qué se trata. Los tecnosacerdotes están rezando al Omnissiah para resolver el problema».

languages.text: 「テクノマット達は、システム障害が原因の可能性があるとの結果に辿り着きました…しかし、そういった障害は確認されていません。技術司祭達は問題解決を願って万機神に祈りを捧げています」
languages.original_text: "The technomats concluded that they could have been caused by a system failure... but no such failure was confirmed. The Tech-Priests are praying to the Omnissiah in hopes of resolving the issue."

traits.locale_text: 「テクノマット達は、システム障害が原因の可能性があるとの結果に辿り着きました…しかし、そういった障害は確認されていません。技術司祭達は問題解決を願って万機神に祈りを捧げています」

languages.text: "Teknomatlar, sistem arızasından kaynaklanmış olabileceği sonucuna vardı... Ancak böyle bir arıza saptanmamıştı. Tekno Rahipler, sorunu çözmek umuduyla Hermesih'e dua ediyorlar."
languages.original_text: "The technomats concluded that they could have been caused by a system failure... but no such failure was confirmed. The Tech-Priests are praying to the Omnissiah in hopes of resolving the issue."

traits.locale_text: "Teknomatonlar bir sistem arızasından kaynaklanmış olabileceği sonucuna vardı ancak bu tip bir arıza teyit edilmedi. Tekno Rahipler sorunu çözme umuduyla Hermesih'e dua ediyorlar."
